channel.title: Today We Fight Back?
channel.description: make it so it can at least be closed.

item.title: Today We Fight Back?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You could have clicked the big X in the top right corner to close it, should have been pretty obvious, but anyway, it was just for a day and it’s over now so there you go.

item.title: Today We Fight Back?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:10, topic:539984”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=658834.msg4406654#msg4406654 date=1392192678]

The website is non-profit
You don’t advertise for a non-profit for an illegitimate cause
[/quote]This isn’t a non-profit website…

From my understandings all profits from moparscape just sit in a bank account and don’t do anything. As I recall MITB uses them for the occasional “beer” run.[/quote]I’m pretty sure you have to register to become a non-profit and declare all your earnings etc. You can’t just reserve the profit and then just dip into it when you feel like a bit of a wage. Obviously I don’t know if moparscape is registered as a non-profit, but it doesn’t sound like it?

Read full topic

item.title: Today We Fight Back?

The website is non-profit
You don’t advertise for a non-profit for an illegitimate cause
[/quote]This isn’t a non-profit website…[/quote]

From my understandings all profits from moparscape just sit in a bank account and don’t do anything. As I recall MITB uses them for the occasional “beer” run.

item.title: Today We Fight Back?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:4, topic:539984”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=658834.msg4406629#msg4406629 date=1392179421]
I posted a thread on AdBlock’s website reporting the advertisement since the damn extension isn’t removing it, it’s so annoying.
[/quote]

Works just fine. Although why would you want to block something that only lasts a day?[/quote]
Oh… didn’t know we could do that… and because a day I simply don’t feel like having?

Davidi2:

Yea… it’s not an advertisement Soulcist.

How is that not considered an advertisement? http://puu.sh/6SWCq.png

It’s advertising a website.

Read full topic
